pull.title: [Wallet] Move key derivation logic from GenerateNewKey to DeriveNewChildKey

rename.from: Move key derivation logic from GenerateNewKey to DeriveNewKey
rename.to: [Wallet] Move key derivation logic from GenerateNewKey to DeriveNewKey

rename.from: [Wallet] Move key derivation logic from GenerateNewKey to DeriveNewKey
rename.to: [Wallet] Move key derivation logic from GenerateNewKey to DeriveNewChildKey

events.body: Concept ACK. After having done multiple implementation of a subclasses of `CKeyStore` (`CHDKeyStore`), I think this "new" function should slowly be moved toward `CKeyStore` (or a subclass of it). The whole HD stuff could be kept there to not overpolute `CWallet` (because in general hierarchical key derivation can be wallet neutral).

events.message: Move key derivation logic from GenerateNewKey to DeriveNewChildKey

events.body: Code review ACK, but needs rebase.

issue.title: [wallet] Move key derivation logic from GenerateNewKey to DeriveNewChildKey (pstratem)

comments.body: nit: name is awfully close to GenerateNewKey to me. Perhaps something like "DeriveNewHDKey" or "DeriveNewChildKey".

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -156,6 +120,47 @@ CPubKey CWallet::GenerateNewKey()
     return pubkey;
 }
 
+void CWallet::DeriveNewChildKey(CKeyMetadata &metadata, CKey &secret)
+{
+    // for now we use a fixed keypath scheme of m/0'/0'/k
+    CKey key;                      //master key seed (256bit)
+    CExtKey masterKey;             //hd master key
+    CExtKey accountKey;            //key at m/0'
+    CExtKey externalChainChildKey; //key at m/0'/0'
+    CExtKey childKey;              //key at m/0'/0'/<n>'
+
+    // try to get the master key
+    if (!GetKey(hdChain.masterKeyID, key))
+        throw std::runtime_error("CWallet::GenerateNewKey(): Master key not found");

@@ -156,6 +120,47 @@ CPubKey CWallet::GenerateNewKey()
     return pubkey;
 }

comments.body: No need to fix this. A rebase will solve it, IIRC. (This should read `__func__` in master already)
